ComicInfo.Summary: Becoming Part 2: Every night in his dreams, Levi finds himself transformed into a creature of the Green in an Arizona desert facing the Pale Wanderer, witnessing the Wanderer killing an innocent before killing Levi himself. Jennifer helps Levi to learn to deal with the changes that he is going through so that he can stand up to the Wanderer.
